Text:
"Downloading" for 2 hrs 18 min; stuck at 0.0%

Is anybody actually getting this?
theburningbush --- been happening to me for a few weeks now - have to re start your computer
i am also having issues downloading this
I've tried rebooting and still no luck. There must be a problem with the torrent itself.

11 hrs 15 min of "downloading" -- still at 0.0%. As for TvTeam's 480p version of this, it's 5 hrs 10 min of "downloading" -- still at 0.0%.

Meanwhile, I've successfully DL'd several other torrents.

maymay04: Restart my computer? Are you effing serious?

AND...a person over at KAT commented about this TvTeam torrent: "having trouble downloading this!! Stuck at 0.0% for like 2 hours now!!"

I'm happy to report that although this torrent appears to be forever stuck at 0.0%, the one at https://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8277936/Chelsea.Lately.2013.03.19.Steve.Carell.480p.HDTV.x264-mSD is now slowly showing signs of life; it's all the way up to 3.0% availability right now...and climbing.
i have made it to 30.2 % only 12 hours of torrenting later, the 480p one is still at 0% what the fuck is going on tvteam???
theburningbush: is it necessary to be rude? i was having this problem with all torrents and i had to re start my computer and then they worked fine. it was just a suggestion.
